function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in buildings, especially hospitals, leading to increased risk of airborne infection","Impact":"Higher risk of nosocomial and other communicable infections, potential for cross-infection in public spaces and hospitals","Mitigation":"Ensure suitable ventilation rates, provide natural ventilation, use carbon dioxide tracer-gas techniques for analysis","Technologies":"Ventilation louvers, upper ventilation windows, natural ventilation systems","People":"Health practitioners, patients, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Closed-end hallways or corridors leading to restricted air circulation","Impact":"Potential for hot air circulation and barrier to air movement, increasing the risk of airborne infection","Mitigation":"Provide open-ended corridors, avoid closed-end hallways, use ventilation louvers on doorstops","Technologies":"Ventilation louvers, upper ventilation windows","People":"Architects, building designers, facility managers","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation rate (ACH) in hospital isolation wards","Impact":"Increased risk of SARS and other airborne infection among health practitioners","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rate requirement (ACHs-Air Changes per Hour)","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, air spaces design","People":"Health practitioners, patients, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety professionals"}]}
